ComicInfo.Summary:
No more secrets...a dead body's discovered, and Nancy can't keep the mystery from her friends any longer. Will telling the truth and getting her crime-solving crew involved help crack the Bayport case, before someone else winds up dead? The modern take on the classic mystery icon continues from KELLY THOMPSON (Hawkeye, Star Wars, Rogue & Gambit) and JENN ST-ONGE (Giant Days, The Misfits)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tula Lotay | 1 | B | Cover B | Paulina Ganucheau | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover C | Jenn St-Onge | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Tula Lotay | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Paulina Ganucheau | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jenn St-Onge | 6 |
